From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>




*BrightBlade dodged the shot from Megatron and stepped back, she was covered 
from head to toe in black soot from Gangon's explosion. She could have 
killed him!!! If she had learned one thing it was DO NOT REWIRE A WEAPON 
UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING!!!
She looked over at him and glared, she suddenly sneezed(like the short and 
sudden ones that dogs and foxes do).*

" YOU IDIOT!"

* She yipped in anger again but the transmission from Black Arach stopped 
her short, she and Gangon were required to go to the Maximal base for and 
attack. BrightBlade looked at Gangon and motioned with her head, they were 
to leave. Now!
She turned towards the Predacons and bowed with extreme sarcasm...*

" Farewell, Traitors. I must now leave, orders. Hell Beast has called. And I 
would rather face the wrath of your weapons then the wrath of Hell Beast if 
I disobey him."

* BrightBlade turned and transformed into her B mode, she flipped her tail 
up at the traitors and then began to scamper off towards the Maximal base. 
She looked back at Gangon to follow and soon disappeared into the brush.*
